page.title: 12HEALTH 1 - PULBOROUGH.
page.content: There are two Doctor's surgeries in Pulborough, one situated in Barnhouse Lane and the doctors are Dr Jeffery, Dr Shillingford and Dr King.The other is in Lower Street and the doctors are Dr Gibbon,Dr Hard,& Dr Whyte_Venables. Dr Shillingford's surgery is brand new and employs 12 receptionists 2 district nurses,1 health worker, 1 midwife,1 social worker.Patients come from within a 6 mile radius.From Monday to Friday about 40 patients are seen during morning surgery between 7.30_11.30.In the afternoon 30 patients are seen.Appointments and open surgery system are used.Doctors visit patients at home between 11.30 and 4.00.Village surgeries are held in West Chiltington,Fittleworth,Cold Waltham and Amberley.When on call the doctors carry an electronic bleeper.
